description:
As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die stärkste Kreatur aller Zeiten – Kaido der hundert Bestien
La créature la plus forte. Le Yonkou Kaido aux cent bêtes
Saikyou no Seibutsu: Yonkou - Hyakujuu no Kaidou
The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors: Kaido, King of the Beasts!
الكائن الأقوى! اليونكو ملك الوحوش كايدو!
最強の生物 四皇・百獣のカイドウ
